channel.title: Need help with RichScape!
channel.description: How do I make people mods/admins? I've looked around and it's different than most sources, it doesn't have a start to a mod/admin list.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 03:20:24 PM[/size][hr]'Ello?

item.title: Need help with RichScape!
item.dc:creator: @Technopath Technopath
item.description:
@Technopath wrote:

Go to your character folders. Then click on the account you want to make an Mod/Admin/Owner and open the file. You will see towards the top where is says “character-rights = 0”. Change that to either:
1:mod
2:admin
3.owner
4.hidden admin

Just put one of those numbers where it says “0” and it will give them their rights.

Hope I helped -Kevin

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with RichScape!
item.dc:creator: @Zach_Is_Back Zach Is Back
item.description:
@Zach_Is_Back wrote:

Ahh, that was simple… I looked there before, I must of overlooked the playerrights… Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 03:29:44 PM[/size][hr]One more question, how do I change the ugly old admin and mod crowns? Would I need to create a client?

item.title: Need help with RichScape!

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Data file or Edit player rights in charactor file.
